p: Table 2 shows the clinical findings in the children with severe and non-severe HAdV infection. Children with severe disease presented with more hepatomegaly (p = 0.002, OR 5.64 [95%CI 1.89,16.84]), hepatitis (p = 0.01, OR 6.62 [95%CI 4.00,10.92]), disseminated disease (p<0.001, OR 15.41 [95%CI 4.68, 50.78]) and seizures (p = 0.03, OR 1.38 [95%CI 1.32,142.86]).
